<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">        BytesToHash = Prev&#91;TI.toArrayIndex()&#93;.Hash;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">      S.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blake3/#ad247de2450380eeba2fab0e794d5e44f">update</a>(BytesToHash);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Off = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9db8c44b250b90e3ab7e4d144e7c9c2ea60baadb22e80b147e4885ad16760e569">Ref</a>.Offset + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9db8c44b250b90e3ab7e4d144e7c9c2ea60baadb22e80b147e4885ad16760e569">Ref</a>.Count &#42; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/typeindex">TypeIndex</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t forget to add in any trailing bytes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TrailingBytes = RecordData.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a55089293ebaccd683a82d97170041376">drop&#95;front</a>(Off);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  S.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blake3/#ad247de2450380eeba2fab0e794d5e44f">update</a>(TrailingBytes);</span></CodeLine>
